name: HOLOTRIP
description:
The idea of Rebirth as tool of self-understanding & self-improvement based of Stanislav Grof's Trans-personal psychology treatment techniques. This experience combines those ideas in this interactive and gamificative fantastic journey that was made by me as part of Final Project for studies at Avni School of Art and Design.

*The experience requires Cardboard based VR headset + Android smartphone with good GPU.
